named-query.name: alias.param1
named-query.query: SELECT a.alias FROM Alias AS a WHERE (a.alias IS NULL AND :param1 IS NULL) OR a.alias = :param1

named-query.name: customer.area
named-query.query: SELECT Distinct Object(c) From Customer c, IN(c.home.phones) p where p.area LIKE :area

named-query.name: customer.city
named-query.query: SELECT c from Customer c where c.home.city IN :city

named-query.name: customer.name
named-query.query: select c.firstName FROM Customer c Group By c.firstName HAVING c.firstName = concat(:fname, :lname)

named-query.name: customer.substring
named-query.query: select count(c) FROM Customer c JOIN c.aliases a GROUP BY a.alias HAVING a.alias = SUBSTRING(:string1, :int1, :int2)

named-query.name: employee.deptBase
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.department = :dept AND e.salary > :base

named-query.name: employee.?1
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.name = ?1 ORDER BY e.name

named-query.name: employee.dept
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.salary = (SELECT MAX(e.salary) FROM Employee a WHERE a.department = :dept)

named-query.name: order.doubleValue
named-query.query: select object(o) FROM Order o Where SQRT(o.totalPrice) > :doubleValue

named-query.name: product.date
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p From Product p where p.shelfLife.soldDate NOT BETWEEN :date1 AND :newdate

named-query.name: product.int1
named-query.query: Select Distinct Object(p) from Product p where (p.quantity > (500 + :int1)) AND (p.partNumber IS NULL)

named-query.name: employee.update.positional
named-query.query: UPDATE Employee e SET e.manager = ?1 WHERE e.department = ?2

named-query.name: employee.delete.dept
named-query.query: DELETE FROM Employee e WHERE e.department = :dept

named-query.name: employee.deptno
named-query.query: select e from Employee e where e.dept.deptno in :deptno

named-query.name: dept.findAll
named-query.query: select o from Dept o

named-query.name: dept.dname
named-query.query: select o from Dept o where o.dname in (:dname1, :dname2, :dname3)

named-query.name: employee.collection
named-query.query: SELECT e.name, d.dname FROM Employee e, Dept d

named-query.name: address.stateField
named-query.query: SELECT c.lastName FROM Address a JOIN a.customerList AS c

named-query.name: product.quantity
named-query.query: SELECT AVG(p.quantity) FROM Product p

named-query.name: employee.sum
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(e.salary) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: order.sum1
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(o.totalPrice) FROM Order o

named-query.name: order.sum2
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(o.price) FROM Order o

named-query.name: order.sum3
named-query.query: SELECT SUM(o.realPrice) FROM Order o

named-query.name: employee.lower
named-query.query: SELECT LOWER(e.name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.upper
named-query.query: SELECT UPPER(e.name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: product.max
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(p.quantity) FROM Product p

named-query.name: product.min
named-query.query: SELECT MIN(p.quantity) FROM Product p

named-query.name: employee.max
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(e.salary) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.min
named-query.query: SELECT MIN(e.salary) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: address.concat
named-query.query: SELECT CONCAT(a.street, a.city) FROM Address a

named-query.name: address.length
named-query.query: SELECT LENGTH(a.street) FROM Address a

named-query.name: address.locate
named-query.query: SELECT LOCATE(a.street, 'Arco Drive') FROM Address a

named-query.name: employee.mod
named-query.query: SELECT MOD(e.salary, e.empId) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: address.size
named-query.query: SELECT SIZE(a.customerList) FROM Address a JOIN a.customerList c

named-query.name: order.sqrt
named-query.query: SELECT SQRT(o.totalPrice) FROM Order o

named-query.name: address.substring
named-query.query: SELECT SUBSTRING(a.state, 0, 1) FROM Address a

named-query.name: employee.trim
named-query.query: SELECT TRIM(e.name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: order.coalesce1
named-query.query: SELECT COALESCE(o.price, o.price) FROM Order o

named-query.name: order.coalesce2
named-query.query: SELECT COALESCE(o.totalPrice, SQRT(o.realPrice)) FROM Order o

named-query.name: order.coalesce3
named-query.query: SELECT COALESCE(o.number, e.name) FROM Order o, Employee e

named-query.name: order.coalesce4
named-query.query: SELECT COALESCE(o.price, o.number) FROM Order o

named-query.name: alias.key1
named-query.query: SELECT KEY(k) FROM Alias a JOIN a.ids k

named-query.name: alias.key2
named-query.query: SELECT KEY(e).firstName FROM Alias a JOIN a.addresses e

named-query.name: alias.value1
named-query.query: SELECT VALUE(v) FROM Alias a JOIN a.ids v

named-query.name: alias.value2
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM Alias a JOIN a.ids v

named-query.name: alias.value3
named-query.query: SELECT VALUE(e).zip.code FROM Alias a JOIN a.addresses e

named-query.name: alias.entry
named-query.query: SELECT ENTRY(e) FROM Alias a JOIN a.ids e

named-query.name: address.collection
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Address a JOIN a.customerList c

named-query.name: employee.subquery1
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE EXISTS (SELECT p FROM Project p JOIN p.employees emp WHERE emp = e AND p.name = :name)

named-query.name: employee.caseInsensitive
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee E

named-query.name: employee.func1
named-query.query: SELECT FUNC('toString', e.name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.func2
named-query.query: SELECT FUNC('age', e.empId, e.salary) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.func3
named-query.query: SELECT FUNC('age', e.empId, e.name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.func4
named-query.query: SELECT FUNC('age', e.empId, :name) FROM Employee e

named-query.name: dept.floorNumber
named-query.query: select d.floorNumber from Dept d

named-query.name: product.abs
named-query.query: SELECT ABS(p.quantity) FROM Product p

named-query.name: order.abs
named-query.query: SELECT ABS(o.totalPrice) FROM Order o

named-query.name: project.abs
named-query.query: SELECT ABS(p.id) FROM Project p

named-query.name: employee.resultVariable1
named-query.query: SELECT e.name AS n From Employee e

named-query.name: employee.resultVariable2
named-query.query: SELECT e.name n From Employee e

named-query.name: employee.resultVariable3
named-query.query: SELECT e.salary / 1000D n From Employee e

named-query.name: address.index
named-query.query: SELECT INDEX(c) FROM Address a JOIN a.customerList c

named-query.name: employee.subquery.code_1
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.salary > (SELECT AVG(f.salary) FROM Employee f)

named-query.name: employee.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.update4
named-query.query: UPDATE Employee e SET e.manager = ?1 WHERE e.department = ?2

named-query.name: employee.addition1
named-query.query: SELECT 2 + 2.2F FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.addition2
named-query.query: SELECT AVG(e.salary) + 2E2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.addition3
named-query.query: SELECT e.salary + 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.addition4
named-query.query: SELECT e.name + 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.substraction1
named-query.query: SELECT 2 - 2.2F FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.substraction2
named-query.query: SELECT AVG(e.salary) - 2E2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.substraction3
named-query.query: SELECT e.salary - 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.substraction4
named-query.query: SELECT e.name - 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.division1
named-query.query: SELECT 2 / 2.2F FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.division2
named-query.query: SELECT AVG(e.salary) / 2E2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.division3
named-query.query: SELECT e.salary / 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.division4
named-query.query: SELECT e.name / 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.multiplication1
named-query.query: SELECT 2 * 2.2F FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.multiplication2
named-query.query: SELECT AVG(e.salary) * 2E2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.multiplication3
named-query.query: SELECT e.salary * 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.multiplication4
named-query.query: SELECT e.name * 2 FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.case1
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN e.name = 'Java Persistence Query Language' THEN 'Java Persistence Query Language' WHEN e.salary BETWEEN 1 and 2 THEN SUBSTRING(e.name, 0, 2) ELSE e.name END FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.case2
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN e.name = 'JPQL' THEN e.working WHEN e.salary BETWEEN 1 and 2 THEN TRUE ELSE p.completed END FROM Employee e, Project p

named-query.name: employee.case3
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN e.name = 'JPQL' THEN e.working WHEN e.salary BETWEEN 1 and 2 THEN SUBSTRING(e.name, 0, 2) ELSE e.dept END FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.date1
named-query.query: SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.date2
named-query.query: SELECT {d '2008-12-31'} FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.true
named-query.query: SELECT TRUE FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.false
named-query.query: SELECT FALSE FROM Employee e

named-query.name: dept.new1
named-query.query: SELECT NEW java.util.Vector(d.dname) FROM Dept d

named-query.name: employee.nullif1
named-query.query: SELECT NULLIF(e.name, 'JPQL') FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.nullif2
named-query.query: SELECT NULLIF(2 + 2, 'JPQL') FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.enum
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN e.name = 'Pascal' THEN com.titan.domain.EnumType.FIRST_NAME WHEN e.name = 'JPQL' THEN com.titan.domain.EnumType.LAST_NAME ELSE com.titan.domain.EnumType.NAME END FROM Employee e

named-query.name: employee.in
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.name IN :type

named-query.name: address.addition
named-query.query: SELECT a.id + 2 FROM Address a
